subtitle.translate: Farmers are no strangers to composting, as one would expect; sometimes you may see Villagers experimenting with a larger-scale form of composting their leftovers.

description: Compost Heaps are houses dedicated to treating and processing a pile of Organic Compost, made from organic leftovers, straw and dirt. This rather smelly mixture may seem strange at first, but given enough sunshine and moisture, will eventually become a valuable farming resource: Rich Soil!
